title.rendered: LAWS Takes Part in U of T Law’s See Yourself Here

content.rendered: In an effort to increase access to legal education and legal careers, the University of Toronto Faculty of Law hosted the annual See Yourself Here (SYH) open house for high school students.  LAWS facilitated a number of educational workshops, discussing issues such as criminal culpability, trial advocacy and the presumption of innocence.  All students had the opportunity to participate in an engaging mock trial, allowing them to envision what their future may hold in store for them.
